Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
DisconnectListener, ViewListener, MessageHandler, Runnable, EventListener
public class Client extends Object implements MessageHandler, ViewListener, Runnable, DisconnectListener
Class for client-side communication
